title: Roast pork leg with red wine and mustard sauce
ingredients: ['1.5kg boneless pork leg joint', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 tablespoon mustard seeds', '2 teaspoons mustard powder', '2 teaspoons Dijon mustard', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '750ml dry red wine', '700ml chicken stock', '1 onion, finely chopped']
